        Constructor for QuestLogViewer
        Parameters:
        image - background image of the scene
        x - where the scene begins in x
        y - where the scene begins in y
        eventAdder - reference to the event queue
        entities - copy of entity list, to add components
        questLog - reference to the players quest log
